column3: Great little place with a lot of character and friendly service.  Whether it’s for coffee, food or a beer, you won’t be disappointed.  Stop by if you’re in the area.

I've lived in sunset for over 20 years, always passing by but never stopped by. First time today with hubby, and he had the espresso Latte, and I had the Butterscotch Latte and Wow! Perfect coffee ratio to sweetness. We didn't have to add any sugar to it.  We also shared a Vegetarian breakfast burrito and we loved it!  There was corn, black bean, cheese, scrambled egg and sauce wrapped with perfectly toasted tortilla wrap. Perfect size for breakfast.

A small place with lots of character... and very good breakfast food that we enjoyed while we waited fro the zoo to open. The almond croissant was not overly sugared or sweet, as so many of them are... and the bacon breakfast burrito had bacon that was actually crisp and thick, unlike the soft, mushy bacon often found in other breakfast burritos. The orange juice was fresh-made, the espresso was quite satisfying. The staff were friendly and busy at three same time. A steady flow of customers showed that this small place has built up a following.
Extremely friendly service, neat things to try. I went back less than an hour later. They also serve alcohol but have a limited selection. Limited seating as well but overall enjoyable experience.

Best smoked salmon I've had yet! My husband had the sausage sandwich and loved it but took half of my bagel because he loves salmon. The berry soda bread was yummy! The vanilla latte and butterscotch latte was AMAZING!!!!
Less than acceptable sandwich today. Ordered a turkey club sand got this. Chicken, but not only that the chunks are huge, too large for a sandwich.

The food here is tasty and the location is top notch by the zoo and ocean. However the service is not pleasant. The staff not friendly, and the loud speaker calling when your food is ready is so annoying. We ordered salmon bagel and mozzarella melt. They both tasted great but the way that they served the sandwich stacked wasn’t appealing and I’m not sure why they would stack several mozzarella breads on top of each other.
incredible!! oat milk cortados were perfect & that sun dried tomato cream cheese was impeccable
Great bagels! The lox bagel on asiago was delicious and hot. Easy walking distance from ocean beach and the zoo. Lots of parking. Can do walk up or dine in
Great people, great customer service, fast service. Really helped they didn't care I brought a dog in, there was no where to tie her off.
Easy free parking, near hotels, zoo, Beach, Irish Cultural Center and a streetcar and bus line. The coffee is fine and ask the customers were very contented, many loyal regulars.
I come here for the Tsunami sandwich and it never disappoints! I get the coffees as well but the sando is the big ticket.

Excellent ambiance - a great balance of chill and social. It was quiet enough that I could tutor virtually, but not so quiet that I felt out of place doing so.  Solid Wi-Fi, nice menu selection, and clean bathroom.
Super cute place!! Great customer service, definitely going back!
Got a small hot chocolate and it took them about 2 minutes. Very nice interior and workers.
Great food, plenty of table space. Easy parking!
Outstanding food and customer service!
Mixed up my vegan order. Got sick from cream cheese. DoorDash won’t even post review. People be careful and make sure you got what you ordered.
Great coffee and breakfast bagel sandwiches. Beautiful on a nice day to enjoy the beach
We had probably the best chicken club sandwich EVAR! Nice people, and cute atmosphere. We wanted to try their Irish Soda Bread, but they had sold out by noon. Must be popular!
Local coffee ☕️  shop across the street from the zoo and a few blocks from the ocean.
Good coffee nice place to Relax and enjoy the the coffee is close to the ocean and the zoo a lot parking

The food was fresh and tasty! (We didn't try the java.) They had one of the best croissants I have had outside of France. If you want one of their bagels, go early in the day - they were mostly gone by 3 pm.

The coffee was wonderful, potato soup was tasty. The breakfast burrito and breakfast sandwiches were still very cold inside (partially frozen in the center and cold surrounding), the flavor was good, but the lack of warmth caused some drops in stars. Some of the staff was kind, most of the staff appeared to not care about their jobs. Due to the flavor of the food, and the delicious coffee, I give this three stars.
love this place so much. everything is always delicious and everyone is super nice

First visit to this restaurant although I have passed it hundreds of times while traveling to Ocean Beach. I thought it was another burger joint -- not at all. More like a Mexican cuisine. I had a turkey sandwhich with pesto on a multigrain breaf. Very good! It came with chips. I plan on visiting it again.

A little slow at times (or busy with a lot of orders) but usually worth the wait. A must stop when in that area of SF. Totally pet friendly. There is an old fast-food statue of a giant red dog face nearby. Try to see if you can learn it's weird history.

Holy moly that’s the best butterscotch latte in the world! Need more! Can you run a 64oz for $6.40? So I can sip that all the way down the beach!! Yum!! Also the salmon bagel. exquisite. delectable.  and light, even with all that cream cheese!! I lightly salted, and put a pack of pepper on there, perfection! Wasn’t sure I was going to like salmon for breakfast, but wow was I wrong! And very nice friendly staff! Thank you for  making beach day great!

In town for business and looking for a breakfast spot.  Hit this place up and had the salmon bagel.  It was delicious. Stonefly suggest this place. They got my buddies order mixed up, he didn't order cream cheese but got it, he ate it anyways and loved it.
Over priced….$13 for a mineral water and a sausage egg muffin. Nothing special about the sandwich…falls right in the average category…cashier could at least be welcoming..
I had a great time here and the servers were amazing. Overall a great place to check out.

I really enjoy their sandwiches.  The salads are good but I have to try more of their items. Overall,  it's a great place for lunch or a cup of coffee.  I don't think you can have a bad lunch time here.  Free Internet is a plus
A very nice spot for breakfast. 30$ a breakfast for 2 which is still quite expensive for French people but in the average of what you could get at San Francisco.

Great sandwiches, friendly stuff, nice outside seats. I particularly want to mention hot chocolate, which was really tasty and was not over-sweetened. Many US places tend to add too much sugar to drinks  which make them tasteless, but here it was a proper cocoa/chocolate.

Great breakfast / lunch spot, with a large selection of sandwiches (both cold and hot), pastries, and bagels. Nice coffee too! Hard to beat, especially because it's directly by the entrance to the SF zoo!

I was driving with a friend heading towards the beach when we spotted Java Beach and found easy parking right in front. The latte I had was good and they offered food and alcohol too! They even had beer on tap. It was a nice quick stop with good drinks, friendly service, and lots of menu options.

Really enjoy going to this place to get coffee.   Not a starbucks, and that is a good thing.   The staff is friendly, and generally the food is served hot.   Limited menu with salads and sandwiches, but I like to go there early in the morning and buy my guilty pleasure donut
I like sandwiches over here. Cashier was nice and helpful.

I stoped in for a coffee just passing by and decided to try the Irish bread. I am so glad I did ,it is perfection. Moist, light, a tad sweet. I had 2 the raisin and fresh fruit . I craved it over the next day and then went back and had a piece and took two more to go . Service is friendly and atmosphere is pleasant . defiantly come try this secret Family recipe for Irish soda bread .

Java Beach is one of my new favorite coffee spots. From the outside seating, there is a beautiful view of the Pacific ocean, and when it's nice outside it feels like heaven. The coffee is also amazing at Java Beach, and so are the pastries and other things they sell. Prices are a little expensive but still reasonable compared to other places in the city. Employees are very helpful and kind.

Great sandwiches (including vegetarian options) near the beach. The staff is really friendly and the coffee is good. There's also outdoor seating if you come with a dog, this is a good neighbourhood spot!

Nice little coffee shop across the street from the Zoo. Good selection coffee and tea with a nice variety of food options. Great ingredients and execution. My only complaint would be that both the front ordering and seating areas felt a little cramped.

Since we have been coming here since 2000 be it for brew or food, my wife and I have never been disappointed at the Java Beach-Zoo. A number of sandwiches from have made it in find shape from here to PacBell Park, now Oracle Park🎉 …

We come here almost every week and are never disappointed. We love Java beach!!! Their bagels in the morning make my whole day. My personal favorite is the pesto veggie bagel. Sitting outside on a nice and sunny day is my perfect morning.
Very friendly staff. Had a breakfast burrito and my husband loved it and he's not up breakfast burrito type of person.

I ordered from this place a couple of times. One time, I ordered a sandwich over the phone... Waited 15min went there, and sandwich was not ready. Waited another 10min... I get the sandwich, it was extremely sloppy; box was covered in oil. And the most important part... They screwed up on my sandwich. Second time, they screw up on my order and almost charged me double the price of the sandwich if I hadn't say anything about the price. Had a terrible experience here. Went a block up for better service and quality sandwiches

We always visit when we're in the neighborhood. Coffee and the chai are great, and it's nice to sit outside when the weather cooperates. Recommend getting the Irish soda bread if you come early enough! Both sweet and savory options.

Cool place in a good spot near the beach. Has a good variety of food and good atmosphere. The design, like most things in SF, is a bit cramped and it can feel a bit crowded or hard to find a place to sit. You can always grab it to go and walk down to the beach

Tight on covid days but enough workers to make run smoothly, years since back but ev e n more menu items, but NO Thai Tea nor Bobbas yet,  just not enough room she said is all. OMG the sandwiches are huge!!! Worth the 10.95 alone bring a friend. Even a 420 p e ruin munchi. Out said it was alot! Haha

Java Beach Cafe at the Zoo: excellent Irish soda bread, the bacon and cheddar is the best. Food is good all around, good coffee and even soft serve ice cream for hot days at the beach. Sit at the bar and read the historic picture book of the building of the location for an entertaining coffee break.

I would have given it 4 stars. Everything is great there but when I ordered my Irish soda bread they forgot and when I asked about it they said it was probably getting toasted. They checked, it wasn't there. They then took the soda bread off the rack and put it in a bag and handed it to me. I didn't say anything at the time but she must have known I could feel it wasn't toasted. So, in conclusion they forgot my order, didn't communicate that to me and also when I got it it wasnt toasted.  It was definitely a small thing but left me a little dissatisfied. I'll definitely go back and hopefully update this review with a better experience.
Perfect coffe, vegetable soup of the day, and one of the best sandwiches I have ever eaten in the United States!
Great spot across from the Zoo.  Grap a coffee and  bagel before the beach or Zoo.

Went to Java Beach on Sloat. Incredibly rude cashier working at 3pm today. Did not catch her name... When I ordered my food, she was very snappy, dismissing and not informative. I asked her about soup choices and she pointed at a board and said tomato soup. Then continuously asked, “ what else? What else? What else?” 3-4 times. When I sat down a customer next to me had some other type of creamy white soup... so apparently there was something other than tomato soup. As I was drinking my coffee, I heard her complaining about homework assignments behind me. Towards the end of my meal, I asked her for a to go containers and she requested one of her male coworkers to assist me. Again, dismissing me and not letting me finish my sentence. Since I did not finish what I was initially asking for, she did not hear me say; I needed a to go coffee cup. I had to ask her again, and she responded; “for what?” I have worked in the cafe industry for years, I understand the balance of personal life and work can be tricky. However, letting a “few papers to write” impact your ability to give good customer service is ridiculous. Your the face of the cafe. At least pretend good customer service. Food was delicious.
A absolutely thee best place. Coffee great. My daughter just loves the soft serve and ice cream drinks. Very friendly. Neighborhood cafe

The veggie sandwich was good, but not great, and over priced at $10. The kids liked the ham and grilled cheese sandwich. The coleslaw was too spicy. They were out of all bagels except for cinnamon raisin.

Great little local spot close to the zoo and the beach! Small but everyone is friendly and there are outside seats! Pastries, muffins, bagels, salads, and sandwiches. Everything we ordered was delicious 😋 …

We went to this place for the first time, but the food was quite expensive and not that great. Nothing we had was that good. We had a mocha, two salads, two orange juices, and one BLT sandwich, which costs over $55. If you can find somewhere else to go, I recommended it. Also, the mocha was cold and not hot as it should have been.
The Butterscotch Latte was AMAZING!
Love stopping in for a Cappucino after my walk on the Great Highway. Java Beach has great coffee and for a splurge, they offer Soft Serve Ice Cream Cones!!!! Yum!

Right across from the San Francisco Zoo and near Ocean Beach.  Street parking is available, but limited.  Food is good, but pricey.  Don't let the exterior dissuade you.  It is quite charming, and outdoor seating is available.

This place used to be open 'till 11pm which made it one of my favorites late night coffee-shops but now they are open 'till 8pm. I usually order a hot veggie with mozzarella and cheddar cheese with a 16oz Arnold Palmer. The sub is good and the drink is ok, what's great about this place is that they are a very diverse sweeteners (agave, honey, syrups, etc ) and milks ( rice, almods, and the regulars) and they are all free!

I always like this place but today the server was not polite at all. And also, now they serve it to you out the window?? Im sorry, but how much longer are we going to play the covid game here? Are there no clean tables to sit and enjoy my coffee?

the worst service I have ever received, first they lost my order online, then they said I was lying, even showing receipt and order confirmation they delivered the wrong order.  Don't waste your time going there!!!
Great vanilla bean latte.
great coffee and excellent chai tea. 5 beers on tap too. not much indoor space for seating/always packed, but beach is quite nearby. wifi and an outdoor seating area as well. easy parking
I really like this cafe especially on a bright and sunny day. Their sandwiches are great and so is their coffee. Staff is super friendly and I love the overall vibe.
My go to place for my large cup of French Roast , and quick bite to eat. They do not have refill price for your basic coffee. Get a large coffee.

My favorite coffee shop in SF...very friendly...live music on weekend and some nights...great coffee...laid back(don't come if you are in a hurry) outdoor seating...right next to beach on end of N Judah streetcar line..lots of organic choices ..beer...italian sodas...great soups some vegan..closes at 11pm
Great coffee shop. The have muffins and sandwiches and free wifi.  The only problem is finding an empty table because some people sit at tables with their computers for long periods of time.
Would love having this BLT and coleslaw for breakfast just about any morning.  Great coffee, too! And I love the original artwork by a local woman.
Cute neighborhood coffee shop, friendly staff. Coffee was strong and they had oat milk, so I was a happy camper.
My go to breakfast or lunch spot before heading into the zoo with the kiddos. Salads and paninis are great, can't go wrong with a bagel or pastry. Soft serve froyo is a perfect afternoon treat.
Super Pleasant Staff Clean Fresh Food Yummy Specialty Coffee Makers that take pride in thier work. Please recognize them. Friendly Dog Friendly!!
Very nice, clean, great hand food to take to the beach, what’s not to like. Good location, not part of a chain this is a neighborhood gem.

It's a cozy little eatery near Ocean Beach and the zoo that has great food, delicious drinks and fantastic people! I always love stopping by to grab a cup of coffee and a bagle sandwich on my way to work.
Great placefor food and chill. Right next to ocean beach you can relax drinking a great cup of coffee while looking at the ocean from their outside seating. Staff also super nice!

Great improvements, worth checking out: - Craft Beer: now features "brewed in SF" delicious local craft beers - HUGE improvement in the coffee & espresso drinks. Java Beach on Sloat Blvd is now an excellent place for hot and cold beverages!
Yeah I like this place it was super tasty for breakfast.
cute place serving soft serve, coffee, bagels and sandwiches. They also have beer on draft. It's right across the street from the zoo, and a short walk to the beach.
Great little cafe! Food and drinks are good with a few outdoor tables or you can easily walk down to Ocean beach from here
If you like your coffee like a big hot milkshake you'll love this place
ate lunch here after we visited fort funston beach.  great food and a nice location. staff was very friendly and upbeat. dog friendly.
Great coffee, friendly staff, good food made with care. Anyone who says they got better food and service "up the street" is shilling for a competitor.
The coffee it's very good and also the atention!
Indifferent service. BLT for $13.50 that could have been made by a toddler. No wonder there’s no lunch crowd.
Excellent coffees and sandwiches. The turkey/chicken club is excellent. House chips great too. Top!
Great neighborhood coffee shop.  Bernie's is the best drip coffee choice.  A favorite place to get iced drinks when the weather is great.
Close to ocean across from the zoo. Very good sandwiches and drinks. The gypsy tea is very good. Great view from outside while eating.

I had just purchased my 3RE cup of over priced coffee when I was approached by app police officer, who informed me that he had received a call from the cafe. And that I would have to leave. When I asked him why he suggested that it may be because of my bicycle and bike trailer that I had parked completely out of the way , tucked beside of the area where their compost and recycle cans were placed.  I find the atmosphere there to be very uptight and obviously judgemental. And I suggest that no one who is not a complete snob should visit the premises on fear of being arrested or at least very embarrassed, as I was that day.
Refreshing area of the city.. next to ocean beach, San Francisco Zoo, lake Merced, SFSU. Great coffee, nice and strong. Great staff.
Good cafe for coffee and sandwiches. A bit on the pricier side and can be slow at times, but good if you’re not in a rush.
It was ok, my London fog wasn't the best but is was doable. Really close to the beach, so you can get a coffee and walk to the beach.
Good food

I love Java Beach I really do I think I prefer the Judah location a little more But it's quirky and fun Hard to get a seat and the tables are nailed down so you can't rearrange the furniture So be it Decent eats Vegetarian options that are actually good Clean bathroom Great service Wifi
Great cafe with good service and amazing food. Breakfast bagels are the bomb and the lunch sandwiches are to die for. Loved it!
Coffee n pastries are excellent. The millet, quinoa porridge was awful, overcooked beyond belief. Sandwiches n salad decent though
Nice joint with full menu of Simeon but welll thought sandwiches and salads. Good selection of beers. Nice atmosphere and WiFi.
If you're craving a bagel and lox then be sure order some here! Love to order the mocha both hot and iced.
Great sandwiches. Sandwiches are really big and can be easily shared with a second person. Seating can be a challenge at least at busy days.

Kind of disappointed when I rented it seems like they cut the sandwich and ask my wife and I always get the tsunami it was very small we took out one meat it was not substituted with another and it's pretty pricey for a sandwich $12 for the tsunami
This place is cute, and probably more of an experience "sans pandemic" but it took a long time just to order and the food was just ok. I'll try it again in a few months!
Local coffee shop with friendly service and full meal menu available. I tried the tsunami and was really filling and good. Check it out
Excellent coffee, delicious bagels, wonderful ambiance inside and out.
Ordered online for pick-up which said our food would be ready at 1pm, but we had to wait almost half an hour beyond that anyway.
Good croissants turkey with cheese really taste
Everything in this cafe is 5 stars!!!  My favorite place in all of the city!!  EXCELLENT customer service.....EXCELLENT food, baked goods.... EXCELLENT everything!!!
Good food, good coffee, good pastries, employees are helpfull and friendly. Clean, with nice atmaspher. Usually busy. Great place.
It was hot and uncomfortable. Crowded beyond belief. The bar stools were incredibly uncomfortable. Revamp the place and I'll consider coming back.
Great staff. Always friendly. Reasonable prices. Great food and coffee.
Great breakfast spot before hitting the zoo. Breakfast burritos were large and filling.
- watered down mocha, immediately threw the drink into garbage where it belongs. - friendly baristas and a great space close to the beach.
Just a great neighborhood café with good coffee, bagels and sandwiches! Definitely worth a stop if you go to the zoo.
Nice cafe right across the street from the beautiful S.F Zoo and less then a block from the beach. Had a nice salad and a tea..nice place
Right next to Ocean Beach and HUGE sandwiches with fresh ingredients. Well worth the trip and price!
All I have to say is get the cinnamon roll. Especially if you’ve been surfing Sloat for 3 hours. Gonna miss this place when I leave!
Nice location near Ocean Beach and SF Zoo. Good service but a bit pricey. A good breakfast menu to choose from
Great neighborhood coffee place, open hella early. (They caffeinate the surfers who somehow survive the near freezing waters 2 blocks away.)
5.00 for a large chai tea. Okay cool. But super disappointed that more than half of it was foam. Not okay at all.
Hefty portions, freshly made sandwiches, beer, dog friendly and an amazing view of Ocean Beach. What more could you ask for?
Wonderful as always! Been enjoying their great food and service for a while. Soups especially!
Great coffee and nice staff. Got enough place to sit and chill out. This place is near the zoo and Beach :)
Great staff! Food was delicious and so were the drinks. I'll be back
Excellent food and nice, warm atmosphere with good music. Perfect for writing, focusing, simply having a good time.
Friendly staff. Hot chocolate with whipped cream was perfect for a cold, foggy walk on the beach.
Great place for a cup of c coffee or a cold beer. The help is second to none and the selection is great.
Super smooth coffee and nice staff. I stop here on my way into the zoo
This place is amazing!!! Great coffee and great food! Fantastic constumer service. I love it!!!
Trendy  I felt like my husband should have a man bun!  Delicious coffee and desserts
Good food, good coffee, friendly people and plenty a parking on the main street.
The sandwich menu is good, and there is wine and beer available as well as the coffee stuffs
Love this place for their friendly vibe and delicious breakfast burritos ☺️
Basically a great neighborhood coffee shop with excellent baked goods, fast friendly service and competitive prices.
It took the staff of 3 people about 20 minutes for them to heat up two bagels for us and there were no customers ahead of us.
Great coffee and nice seating inside. Worked for a couple hours and enjoyed it. Nice wifi.
Coffee does taste bad. Store uses plastic floor mats that have holes, which have always smelled like food service worker feet to me.
The staff is usually nice and they are are pretty quick with service, but the salads are a bit pricey for the quality.
Great staff good food though breakfast burrito should be a little bigger imo
Cute small coffee shop. The Mocha and Bear Claw was great. A few blocks from the beach.
Staying nearby and close to Ocean beach, we kept dropping in for a coffee or snack, decent variety on the menu
Great view, near the beach. doing some reading here to pass time while waiting for appointments. recommended.
Super cute place, friendly staff, good coffee and beagles but above all great atmosphere!  :)
Decent coffee and food but the service even when they were hardly busy was at a snails pace.
Tad pricey but locally popular coffee joint. Usual coffee house fare with outdoor seating.
They offer good soft serve ice cream here, not many places in SF have that.
A good place to grab coffee and a light meal/breakfast on the ocean Beach area.  A favorite spot for the locals living in the area.
Basic no frills coffee shop. Great location by the zoo. Friendly staff, good coffee
Decent place to grab a bite and a cup of coffee. Although, place is over priced for a sandwich.
Cool place. Seating can be limited. But I like it. It's quaint. People are nice.
Beautiful lady at the counter with a fantastic smile. Coffee  is great and so is all the staff!!!!!!!
The best sandwiches I have ever had. The veggie sub is amazing.
Had a light supper of the most delicious quiche. Perfectly cooked, flakey crust.
Nice place, they have soft serve ice cream. Good stuff..
Good food, reasonable prices, easy parking, and close to San Francisco Zoo, as well as the beach.
Best place for coffee and food…Awesome staff
Sandwiches are blah and they forgot our chips.. Mimosas were too acidic.
Excellent coffee.   Great snacks and beer Close to the beach and zoo.
My favorite place for a tuna sandwich! I come here, get my tuna sandwich, and sit at the outside tables on a beautiful day.
Organic coffees locally roasted. Excellent dirty chai. Staff not so courteous.
Sandwiches and coffee are very good , but location is not very clean.
Great location, underwhelming coffee and pricey. Have had better coffee  in the middle of nowhere in Texas.
The coffee is worth the rain and wait, specifically the mocha, YUM 😋
Everytime I come into town, zi hsve to visit. Great staff and the food is good too...
Best spot to grab a bite near OB, food is great, place is clean, feels like home.
Great food. Near zoo. Near ocean.  Wi-Fi. Power. The only reason I leave is because they close.
A great place to stop sit outside for coffee on a Sunday morning bike ride
Great place to eat great food friendly and right by the zoo and ocean too..
Parking is convenient early in the day.   Pleasant staff.   Clean facility.
Really good coffee. Food was tasty as well
cool cafe next to sf zoo.
Cool spot down by the beach.  Coffees, beers on tap and food.  Parking was easy.
do not waste your time and money on that place! Horrible!
Man, this is some good coffee. Next time I am in SF, I will be sure to visit again.
Delicious food, great atmosphere!!! Get the mocha😍 …
Great coffee and great service.
Only had coffee and a muffin. Both were fine, but the service was only okay.
Super sweet people. Amazing cinnamon rolls and butterscotch lattes!
Filthy bathroom with the door wide opened the whole time, messy counter, and overpriced stale pastry that was tougher than my dog's toy.
Loved it
WiFi is in and out and not very friendly.  Great location and descent food.....
Great food and coffee, Thursday are best for meatball sandwich
Ordered a sandwich, waited over a half hour for it to be made. Requested a refund and went to Grubbin'.
Cute place. They use waaay too much Mayo on sandwiches.
I like the restaurant because of the delicious and customer services Thank Briana  Francis
Friendly staff, good food and gourmet coffee and tea.
Nice cafe by the ocean in SF.
Delicious French roast coffee. Sandwiches are not to my taste
I've loved everything I've eaten here.   Especially the BLTs
Was given cole slaw in coffee cup. I don't know if that's trendy or classy.
love this place. cute little gem. great lattes.
Great people who work this cafe but it closes too early
One of my favorite places for coffee and breakfast.
Very nice people and tasty food
Where else can you easily get Irish soda bread with your coffee?
Yummy, but a little pricey ! However they have a little bit of everything
Oh I loved BBQ chik n and iced mocha
We visited before we headed into the Zoo. Couldn’t fault the service and food. Served with a smile
Always good, especially the outside seating with the morning sun
Very nice hot sub bbq chicken. Thumbs up!
Good coffee and pastries a little pricey tho
Convenient local establishment with good sandwiches needed in a pinch.
Good people.  Good coffee.  Decent parking.
Good food and coffee but tables are routinely left unclean.
Good coffee and expensive sandwiches. They also serve alcohol.
Nice spot to wine down after walking our dog at the nearby dog park
Favorite cafe in SF. Can't beat a cup of joe and the beach.
A bit expensive, but great proximity to the beach, and great food.
A really nice place, especially on a sunny day. A little expensive though.
Great sandwiches and location handy for the zoo and ocean Beach
This place has low seating areas but the food is worth it.
Delicious coffee, pastries and other cafe goodies.
Perfect pit stop after a trip to the beach or zoo.
Try the sunrise salmon lox bagel! Best in town!
Slow didn't get my order till I asked have good to others first coffee is bitter
Good lattes, lots to nosh on, close to the zoo and the beach. Win, win, win
Great wake up cafe
Love small owned coffee shops,  and this was a gem!
Great food and service.
Friendly laid back place. Good coffee.
If you like sandwiches, get the Tsunami Sub!
What can I saY. I Love The Service I Love everything from here.. outstanding..
I'm Irish but my mummy used to work there from 2000-2001
Nice neighborhood coffee outside table, near the zoo
We took friends there and Saylor rocked our stay.
Great brew - Bernie's
Good food! And great music.
Awesome place to immerse in your laptop with coffee.. !
Cool local coffe/cafe with great food and service
Great food, great coffee, great atmos, just great
Just awesome having coffee near the ocean
After waiting for half an hour, when asked they told they forgot my order !!
These bagels are off the hook.   Yum
Great food, friendly neighbors.
Great for a post or pre-beach or zoo snack
Great French Roast and Awesome Staff
Nice staff. Good coffee.
Good food, good beer, good service.
Nice little place for a quick bite and coffee
Placed a phone order, excellent customer service!
Friendly staff, very tasty!
Always a long line, but the coffee is only so so.
Nice coffee, and great sandwich!
Friendly, convenient location by the beach and zoo.
Great beachside coffee and treats
Eat here (to go) instead of the zoo. Thank me later.
Very good food for good price.
Good place to stop during a bike ride.
Super friendly, great food
Tasty latte's. Love the location.
Love it love the staff.. Highly recommend...
very slow and hot chocolate was cold
Good food..nice employees
An excellent cafe to hang out at and stare at things
Great salad, eaten outside in the sun
Rude service from the barista and food server.
Great food,great service, great atmosphere
Coffee, drinks and yummy food options.
Love their vegan brownies
Amazing Irish soda bread!
Neighborhood hangout. Good food and coffee.
Bread was a little tough to bite through
Great spot after a morning of surfing.
A nice little place for coffee and?
Best sandos! Friendly staff.
Great sandwich and a great service
Great go to place near the beach
Good service good food good peeps
Good atmosphere, good coffee
Yummy coffee and Sammy's!
Popular place, but still helpful.
Great coffee and food.
Mochas and Italian Ices with the teen agers 😘 …
